text: Niba (wowe Muhamadi) uremererwa no guhakana kwabo (ukaba udashobora kubyihanganira), nubishobora uzashake inzira yo mu butaka cyangwa urwego rwakugeza mu kirere kugira ngo ubazanire igitangaza (kandi ntiwabishobora, bityo jya wihangana). N’iyo Allah aza kubishaka, yari kubahuriza ku muyoboro w’ukuri, uramenye ntuzabe mu njiji
